reviewText: These movies are surprisingly informative for their time. It's good for the nuts and bolts biology of sexual reproduction and puberty. They were probably more frank in the 1950s than they are today. Recommended...

These Shorts are the best! How do you talk to kids about sex at a time in the USA when s-e-x is considered dirty? Actually, these films are more frank than what they probably teach today. Sex is reduced to vague scientific diagrams. The revelations of reproduction are all there, sanitized though they may be. Great fun, and educational!
